name: Eldarya background change
description:
All backgrounds are graphics from Eldarya game, you just didn't know you could use them :3 All are fixed too, so they don't move when you scroll page.
Option to upload your own image for background added, please remember to select "i want my own" in dropdown if you want it, or you won't get it :D

This might not work with any other style using background code(body {background: url(image);}).
